snippet: There were no conclusions or declarations by the 30 participating nations, including Russia and China, according to diplomats.
abstract: Iran, shutout of diplomatic meetings on the Syria conflict, convenes its own emergency consultations, with participants from nearly 30 countries discussing ways to reach a solution; gathering is the first since Kofi Annan resigned as United Nations and Arab League mediator; participants say no conclusions or declarations were met.
lead_paragraph: There were no conclusions or declarations by the 30 participating nations, including Russia and China, according to diplomats.

headline.seo: Iran Hosts Its Own Meetings on Syria Conflict
headline.main: Iran, Excluded From Other Meetings on Syria, Hosts Its Own
headline.print_headline: Iran, Excluded From Talks on Syria, Hosts Its Own, but Reaches No Conclusions

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
